title: How to Change Font in WhatsApp Status

steps.title: Tap the Status icon in WhatsApp.
steps.content: Tap the Status icon in WhatsApp. It's the circle icon at the bottom or top of the screen, depending on your phone or tablet. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the pencil icon next to "My Status."
steps.content: Tap the pencil icon next to "My Status." This opens a screen that lets you compose a text-based status update. If you'd rather type a status onto an image, you can tap the camera icon instead, and then select or capture an image.

steps.title: Tap the T to change the font.
steps.content: Tap the T to change the font. It's at the top of the screen. This changes the sample text to a different font. You can keep tapping the T until you see the font you want to use. If you're typing a status onto an image, start typing your status, and then tap the T repeatedly until you find the font you want to use.

steps.title: Tap the color palette to change the background color.
steps.content: Tap the color palette to change the background color. While you can't change the font color to anything other than white, you can select a different background color for contrast. Just keep tapping the palette icon until you see the color you want.

steps.title: Type your status.
steps.content: Type your status. You can also change the font after typing some or all of your status by tapping the T at the top again.

steps.title: Tap the paper airplane icon to share your status.
steps.content: Tap the paper airplane icon to share your status. It's at the bottom-right corner. Your status is now visible for 24 hours.
